short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts timestamps from YouTube descriptions. Click to jump to tracks. Displays video title and thumbnail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides a popup interface that extracts timestamps from the video description on YouTube. In the popup, you can click on different tracks to jump to specific timestamps in the video. The popup also displays a thumbnail and the title of the video.

Changelog - 02.07.2024:
* Popup loads the video data based on the active tab now, even when changing tabs (need to reopen the extension window after a delay of 2 seconds to show newly loaded data)
* Improved timestamp detections for more formats.

Changelog - 24.06.2024:
* Fixed clicking on individual songs in the popup window now seeking again.
* Removed unnecessary code and permissions.
